full_output.summary: Third-year Computer Science undergraduate with a keen interest in technology and problem-solving. Tackled more than 600 coding challenges on different platforms. Achieved a 3-star rating on CodeChef and secured a rank of 4,309 in CodeVita Season 11 by TCS. Secured a global 159 rank in Starters 131 of CodeChef. Skilled in software development using Python and JavaScript. Experienced in building RESTful APIs and web application backends with Node.js. Proficient in C++, Data Structures, and have expertise in cybersecurity. Targeting a Python Development internship position to leverage coding skills and contribute to a fast-paced environment.

certifications.title: Developing BackEnd Apps with Node.js and Express

education.school: Saraswati Vidya Mandir Sr. Sec. School

projects.name: Login gui
projects.description: Leveraging Tkinter, a native Python library for GUI development, to design a login interface.

projects.name: Backend for restaurant
projects.description: Architected a scalable restaurant platform with Stripe integration for plan purchases. Designed database schema and implemented secure and efficient admin functionalities on Mongo Atlas for restaurant management. Enabled data-driven decision making through robust analytics.

projects.name: Todo list (full stack)
projects.description: Develop a full-stack web application for a to-do list that supports multiple users simultaneously from any location, using email and password for authentication. Implement authentication and authorization using JWT tokens. Build the application with React for the front-end and Express (Node.js) for the back-end, and use MongoDB as the database.

full_output.name: Aanand rai
